headline.main: WARNING: THE WRONG NUTRITIONIST CAN BE DANGEROUS TO YOUR HEALTH

byline.original: By Jane E. Brody; Jane E. Brody is the personal health columnist and a science writer for The New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: SASSAFRAS HERBERT'S WALL sports a handsome certificate, complete with gold seal and red ribbon, declaring her to be a ''professional member'' of the American Association of Nutrition and Dietary Consultants, which calls itself ''a professional association dedicated to maintaining ethical standards in nutritional and dietary consulting.
